transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello? Haan ji good morning main aapne aapne se baat kar raha hun aapke account manager IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ya kal raat ko aapne actually mail dala tha jisme aapne mention kara hai ki aapko koi business nahi mil raha hai and irrelevant leads aa rahi hai aapko IndiaMART ki taraf se please help agar ye dala aapne ek mail.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ji to iske regarding sir main pichle teen char dinon se try kar raha tha aapke brother hai sir secondary number par jo number hai jiske aakhri mein 801 hai unse main try kar raha hun din char dinon se connect karne ka last but baat ho nahi paayi thi even whatsapp par bhi maine message dala tha.
Customer: Aap bata paoge sir? Wo thoda sa thoda issue chal raha hai thoda domestic unka chal raha hai problem chal raha hai. Us wajah se wo shayad pick nahi kar rahe.
Executive: Achcha achcha achcha to abhi sir kaun dekh raha hai sir?
Customer: Main hi dekh raha hun wo pichle ek hafte se main hi dekh raha hun.
Executive: Achcha pichle ek hafte se aap hi dekh rahe hain. Main check kar raha tha wahi main keh raha hun na zyada tar wahi hota hai bhai mere hota hai waha setup pe. Main main check kar raha tha kuch khas leads nahi aa rahi hai yaar.
Executive: Kahan par aapko dikkat aa rahi hai ek baar aap abhi open karoge IndiaMART abhi teen minute pehle Kashmiri lehsun ki ek lead aayi hui hai 500 kg ki requirement hai 3.5 lakh se 6 lakh ka order value ban raha hai GST verified lead hai ek baar aap open karo IndiaMART.
Customer: Buy leads wale section mein jana hai recent wale mein.
Customer: Haan recent mein.
Executive: Usme Kashmiri lehsun aur Himalaya garlic aur single garlic ka ek lead hai Ahmedabad ka 500 kg ka.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: To wo aapko purchase kijiye usko. Okay purchase karke usko apna jo bhi quotation hai ya jo bhi aapka interest hai wo sell kijiye message.
Customer: Nahi main wahi keh raha hun na main maine leads ek hafte se maine leads uthai hai theek hai.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: To waha se kuch cold response aa raha hai koi koi bol raha hai ki maine ek ko call kiya tha to wo keh raha hai ki meri requirement hai matlab meri requirement nahi main hi main sell karta hun.
Executive: Okay yaani wo wo retailer hai.
Customer: Retailer nahi yaar wo khud bech raha hai aur usne requirement dali hai.
Executive: To aise hi chal rahi hai aapne unse pucha? Aapne unse confirm kar aapne unse confirm kara ki aap jab khud sell kar rahe ho to aapne requirement kyun dali hai kya requirement hai kyun dala hai?
Customer: Main yaar usko kya bol sakta hun main ye to nahi bol sakta main IndiaMART thodi na hun ki main usko bolunga kyun dala.
Executive: Nahi aap puch sakte ho ki sir aapne IndiaMART par requirement dal di hai aapko zarurat hai nahi zarurat hai aisa wo confirm to aap kar sakte ho at least aapki requirement hai. Maine sirf yaha se kiya tha usne phone hi uthaya.
Customer: Theek hai fir meri uske whatsapp ke sath through baat hui waha se wo kehne lage ki mujhe hi sell karna hai mere paas hai to mujhe sell karna hai. To main kaha aapki to requirement hai bola nahi requirement nahi hai meri main mujhe sell karna hai. To aise hi theek hai matlab agar main ek hafte se dekhu to ek hafte se I don't know ki ek kuch kuch hi business aaya hai to us hisab se business nahi aa raha hai na us hisab se.
Executive: Sir ek ye problem aapne bataya iske alawa aur kaun sa problem bata rahe ho iske alawa aur kaun se aapne irrelevant mention kiya irrelevant in the sense agar aap briefly bata sako ki aapko order value low order value ke leads aa rahe ho ya other location ke lead aa rahe ho yaha par aap deal nahi karte ho aisi koi leads aa rahi ho aisa kuch.
Customer: Matlab jitni bhi leads hai na ye casual leads lag rahe hain matlab jab hum unse baat karte hain to koi serious buyer hai hi nahi.
Executive: Theek hai ye serious buyer ka issue hai.
Customer: Serious buyer serious buyer nahi hai matlab haan ji humne dal diya tha haan theek hai kya rate hai wo rate hai okay chalo theek hai hum bata denge matlab wo lag raha hai ki aise koi matlab theek hai lag raha hai aise ki matlab serious koi buyer lead hai hi nahi ye koi casual leads leads aa rahi hai yaha pe koi isi wajah se business nahi aa raha hai.
Executive: Okay aapki baat samajh gaya isme jo bole serious buyer wali baat. Aur dusra ek cheez bhi ek ek cheez bhi puchna tha main maine check kiya matlab ki ek hafte se main hi dekh raha hun.
Customer: Hamare pichli pichli baar jab humne liya tha package liya tha to usme kareeban humko 100 100 jo hai na yearly bonus leads mili thi pichle saal ki baat kar raha hun.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Aur is saal is saal ek bhi lead nahi diya hai aapne yearly mein.
Executive: Hosting leads ki aap baat kar rahe ho jab host hota hai service us samay jo aapko leads milti hai uski baat kar rahe ho aap?
Customer: Dekhiye mere bhai jab humne package liya tha pichle saal theek hai.
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: To us time us time yahi package abhi bhi chal raha hai yahi aapne renew karaya same renew karaya aapne. Haan to us us time humko 100 100 leads mili thi yearly leads.
Executive: Okay theek hai.
Customer: Is baar main dekh raha hun is baar ek bhi lead nahi hai yearly mein.
Executive: Ek baar aap hold karoge main ek baar ye check kar leta hun aisa hai kya check karo sir. Ek second ruko sir main check karke bata raha hun ye wala.
(silence)
Executive: Line par rehna sir main check kar raha hun.
(silence)
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Sir ye jo cashback hota hai cashback redeem hoke wo leads mili thi ek baar mere sir jo hai Roshan ji baat karenge wo lead diligence se baat kar lijiye sir.
Executive: Namaste.
Executive: Hello hello namaste sir.
Executive: Namaste sir.
Executive: Namaste kaise ho aap? Kaun Roshan ji bol rahe hain?
Executive: Haan ji haan ji sir.
Executive: Roshan bhai kaise hain?
Customer: Main badhiya sir aap bataye.
Executive: Bas yaar chal raha hai. Roshan bhai main inse baat kar raha tha main actually mere bhai to dekhte hain Parek sahab dekhte hain tabiyat theek nahi hai ek hafte se to main dekh check kar raha tha maine dekh raha tha. Achcha to main dekh main dekh raha hun ke humne kya naam hai iska jab lead balance check karte hain na to usme ek yearly balance karke aata hai pichle saal humne jab kiya tha theek hai to humko 100 lead mili thi yearly mein aur is baar zero hai.
Executive: Haan main main wahi keh raha hun ki wo yearly ka aisa kuch nahi rehta hai right lekin jo mila tha na aapko yaad hoga wo cashback wala tha ek.
Customer: Hmm hello cashback wala tha bhai wo cashback aapka wo by lead convert hui thi na.
Customer: Haan to is baar kyun nahi mila wo? Abhi cashback hai yaha pe pada hua hai cashback.
Customer: Hmm to cashback ka aapko by lead chahiye to hum karwa ke de denge sir koi problem nahi hai. By lead karwa lo zarurat padta hai na hamare liye to main business by lead hi hai.
Executive: Haan nahi to automatically wo change ho jayega aap kahenge to karwa denge nahi to nahi hoga. Nahi hota yaar bada pareshani hua hai. Nahi nahi bada pareshani hota hai jab bhi pichli saal bhi mere jab madam aayi thi to agar aap check karoge na maine uske sath kitni kitna kuch aur leads thi wo mili hi nahi fir last mein unhone mere ko bola teen mahine ke baad ho jayega fir automatically che mahine ke baad ho jayega fir to madam madam hi nikal gayi theek hai to wo waise ke waise raha. To aap isko yearly yearly leads leads mein dal do na mere bhai.
Executive: Chalo koi nahi main dalwata hun sir aap mere ko ek baar ko time do main isko kitni leads milengi 16000 divided by 299 kitna hota hai ek minute wo kya hota hai yaar wahi 50 ke aas paas milegi sir.
Customer: Yaar pichle saal to 100 ki 100 ki mili thi.
Executive: Sir wo ek baar ko check karna padega sir. Arey sir aap check karo sir aise mat kiya karo.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir wo hamare hath mein nahi hota na aur pichli bari shayad aapko kuch bonus by lead bhi mila hoga kyunki aapne pehle renew achcha haan pichli bari aapne nayi service li thi na kaun si hello pichli bari aap star aapne pehli baar wahi main keh raha hun pichli bari aap star pehli baar karwaya tha na haan to new service li thi na aapne haan ji shayad wo new new service ka kuch wo bol rahe the wo liya tha ispe maine kaha ab ab wahi bologe pichli bari aisa hua tha yaar kya karte ho yaar pichle saal bhi yahi yahi package liya tha is is saal bhi yahi package diya aapke kehne pe otherwise hamara to is saal budget hi nahi tha theek hai wo main manta hun lekin package ka to aisa hota hai na ki jaise maan lijiye koi bhi nayi service aap lete ho to nayi service ka to benefit kuch extra milta hai na fir bhi main ek baar ko check kar leta hun ki pichli bari kya mila tha is bari kya nahi mila hai 50 by lead ke lagbhag to wo aapko mil jayega wo to haan 50 by lead aapko mil jayega. Wahi main keh raha hun aapne check kiya aapne haan us time us time matlab humne kiya tha payment bhi time pe timely kiya tha to ab aap thoda sa ispe effort lagao na mere bhai ye kya package hai to wo wo karwa do. Bilkul sir bilkul aur dusra main inko main inko bol raha tha ki aur dusra main inko bol raha tha ki business aa nahi raha hai yaar matlab wo main dekh raha hun ki jo leads hai na matlab serious buyer koi hai hi nahi yahi koi matlab casual casual approach wali leads aa rahi hai hamare paas enquiries bhi nahi aa rahi hai utni sari. Sir enquiries to aap ek baar ek baar thoda iska dekh lo yaar ek second aap ruko main number dekh hi leta hun na enquiry ki baat karu to enquiry to aapke paas mein number sahi aa rahe hain sir calls bhi aapki for that month main aapko enquiry sirf enquiry enquiry ki baat karu na hmm to aapke paas mein 90 100 ka average tha abhi last month ki main baat karu to september mein 104 aayi hai october mein 102 aayi hai november mein 28 tarikh tak aapke paas mein 102 aa chuki hai august mein 101 aayi thi right to aapka jitna aata tha haan dekhiye business wala part is a different thing wo ek baar ko dekh lete hain lekin agar main total number of enquiry ki baat karu to enquiry aapke paas mein achchi aa rahi hai calls ki bhi baat karu to october mein aapke paas 23 calls aayi thi is mahine aapke paas mein abhi tak total 33 calls aa chuki hai right aur uske baad thoda keyword wagera main aur dekh leta hun ki keywords wagera mein kya updation required hai agar kuch updation required hota hai aapka catalog quality score kam hai. P rank mein almond almond wagera mein deal kar rahe ho aap? Almonds haan haan to almonds ka sir koi product added nahi hai aapke profile mein bahut sara product bhai kya ho raha hai maine hi kal edit kiya tha wo category hata di thi main almonds ki almonds mein bahut sara aa raha hai sirf usi ke leads aa rahe hain aur wo wo click nahi ho raha wo california dusra wala california aa raha hai theek hai to hum kashmiri bhi lekin aap ek product aapne update kar rakha hai iranian saffron aapne hata diya hai keyword se kaun sa keh raha hun iranian saffron saffron karke koi product hai na haan wo bhi usme deal nahi karte na achcha wo to hum khud hi kar lete hain aisa kuch nahi hai ji ji almond nuts ka kya aa raha hai hum agar main sunna na mere bhai almond nuts ka maine category khud hi kal hatai thi kyunki usme kya aa raha hai sirf lead sirf almonds ke aa rahe hain almonds ke aa rahe hain theek hai to baki leads aa hi nahi rahe hain to usme usme click nahi aa raha kyunki wo wo wo wala california almonds hai to usme hum deal nahi karte hain achcha to is wajah se thoda yaar thoda leads achche achche bheja karo yaar thoda aise achcha achcha ab business nahi aa raha hai sir main check karta hun kahan pe kya hai ek to ye to thoda refine kar lo yaar ye kya naam hai iska business achchi leads dilwa do hume aur dusra ye hai kya naam hai iska ye ye jo leads achcha leads theek hai haan chalo theek hai sir to main ek kaam karta hun main aapko bata deta hun ki kya kya karna hai hello batao ji ek baar ko keywords wagera main pura ka pura check karwa leta hun ki keywords wagera mein aur kya dal sakte hain kya nahi dal sakte inka catalog quality score kam hai amrit ye ek baar ko rectify karo dusri cheez sir by lead wala sir teen char din ka time lagega lekin ye ho jayega theek hai hum ek kaam karte hain monday tuesday ko connect karte hain tab tak aap jo main feedback de raha hun na to us pe aap kaam kar lijiye tuesday tuesday ko sham ko hum baat karenge theek hai mere bhai bilkul mean while sir tuesday wednesday ko karte hain sir monday ko chutti hai hamari tuesday ko kaam hoga aapka wednesday ko baat karenge mean while sir aapka ye jo feedback aaya tha ye feedback main close kar du na theek hai sir aapke paas jayega ek feedback ke liye aap mujhe feedback de dijiyega mean while main abhi catalog wagera main pura update karwa dunga catalog wagera update hoga tab jaake close hoga wednesday ko wednesday ko wednesday ko pura overall karenge is pe theek hai jo bhi aapka finding hoga wo dekhenge aur jo ye aap keh rahe hain ki leads ka bhi aapko do teen din milni chahiye wo abhi aap dekhna to wednesday ko hum connect karenge tab tak sare sahab bhi aaye honge theek hai mere bhai theek hai theek hai sir okay okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving enough relevant buyleads.

- Leads are casual, not serious buyers.

- No yearly bonus leads received this year.

- Catalog quality score is low.



Resolution:

- Executive checked for Kashmiri garlic lead.

- Executive confirmed cashback leads were previously provided.

- Agreed to add customer to yearly leads program.

- Executive will check keywords and catalog quality.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to update catalog and keywords.

- Connect on Wednesday to discuss findings.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, catalog, keywords, yearly leads
